resources.string: %1$1d selected message will be permanently removed.
The message will be permanently removed from the chat history.
The selection will be removed from the file list, but will not affect any downloaded local files.
There are currently no running backup tasks
Connect to cloud services to back up your session files to the cloud
The following tasks have been queued for processing. The processing process is scheduled by the system, which will minimize resource occupation and performance consumption.
An error occurred while saving the image
Tag should contain at least two characters
To add tags, hit two spaces or a newline after typing here
You will not be notified of new messages
This chat will always be pinned to the top of the list
Once archived, you will not be notified of new messages
High-risk operation! Please handle with care
To send voice messages, you need to authorize the app to use your device\'s microphone.\nYou can also go to the settings page to authorize manually.
Tags help quickly filter and locate chats.\nChanges can be made later. Blank is allowed.
Please enter a tag followed by two spaces or a newline
Available sources are listed below.Check to apply this source to new chats.
Please keep at least one source
The available message sending exits are listed below, and the message will try to send from this exit by default.This option can be changed later.

On Android 13 (Tiramisu) and higher, notification sending requires additional runtime permissions. This permission is necessary for instant messaging applications.You can also go to the settings page to authorize manually.
The grouping will be removed from the conversation list, but will not affect any associated conversations and chat history.
There are currently no sending outlets available
Export chat history to a file (without pictures)
App cache has taken up %1$1s. Cache cleaning does not affect chat history
Connect to cloud services to back up your session files to the cloud
Automatically download files in a suitable network environment and use the default cloud service for backup
Apply automatic backup to selected chats
Automatically delete local files after backup is complete

When automatic backup is enabled, your target session files will be automatically backed up when the following conditions are met:

While connected to a Wi-Fi network
Not in Low Battery Mode
Device is idle
Not in an "out of storage space" state.
This page provides experimental features that may cause unforeseen issues. Please do not provide feedback on the functionality of this page.
Recognize specific entities (addresses, dates, mailboxes, etc.) in static text and as they are typed
Generate reply suggestions based on the full context of the conversation (English only)
The back button will be displayed in the bubble dialog interface
The home button will be displayed on the speech bubble interface. After opening, you can use the full application function in the floating window
Send notifications regardless of application state
Send notifications only when app enters background
Disconnect and reconnect extension without affecting extension running state
Please separate multiple tokens with commas
Before using this feature, make sure your device has a stable connection to Google services.
Take effect after restarting the application
Not available yet, please add cloud service
Push limit for selected sessions Since FCM has a message limit (4000 messages/hour/device), you can manually apply a push limit to sessions with a large amount of messages but low importance.
Check out the documentation for usage guidelines
App colors will respond to wallpaper changes
App color responsive wallpaper changes (requires Android 12 or higher)
Allows the app to send message notifications
Importance level, notification channel, sound, vibration, etc.
Enable notifications for selected chats (archive settings will override this)
Add or modify cloud service connections
Data export and recovery, storage space management
Message reminder, chat bubbles, quick reply
Read the issue description for users and developers
Get the latest updates, make suggestions, discuss bugs
Help us translate the app into your language
Like this app? Go to Google Play and give your review
Support this project to go further
After the extension is updated, the extension connection needs to be manually reset.

Parabox 是一款由 Ojhdt Apps （以下简称“我们”）提供的产品。 您在使用我们的服务时，我们可能会收集和使用您的相关信息。我们希望通过本《隐私政策》向您说明，在使用我们的服务时，我们如何收集、使用、储存和分享这些信息，以及我们为您提供的访问、更新、控制和保护这些信息的方式。 本《隐私政策》与您所使用的 Parabox 服务息息相关，希望您仔细阅读，在需要时，按照本《隐私政策》的指引，作出您认为适当的选择。本《隐私政策》中涉及的相关技术词汇，我们尽量以简明扼要的表述，并提供进一步说明的链接，以便您的理解。

您使用或继续使用我们的服务，即意味着同意我们按照本《隐私政策》收集、使用、储存和分享您的相关信息。

如对本《隐私政策》或相关事宜有任何问题，请通过 ojhdtmail@gmail.com 与我们联系。

1. 我们收集的信息
我们或我们的第三方合作伙伴提供服务时，可能会收集、储存和使用下列与您有关的信息。如果您不提供相关信息，可能无法注册成为我们的用户或无法享受我们提供的某些服务，或者无法达到相关服务拟达到的效果。
个人信息，您在注册账户或使用我们的服务时，向我们提供的相关个人信息，例如电话号码、电子邮件等。
日志信息，指您使用我们的服务时，系统可能通过cookies、标识符及相关技术收集的信息，包括您的设备信息、浏览信息、点击信息，并将该等信息储存为日志信息，为您提供个性化的用户体验、保障服务安全。您可以通过浏览器设置拒绝或管理cookie、标识符或相关技术的使用。

2. 信息的存储

2.1 信息存储的方式和期限
我们会通过安全的方式存储您的信息，包括本地存储（例如利用APP进行数据缓存）、数据库和服务器日志。
一般情况下，我们只会在为实现服务目的所必需的时间内或法律法规规定的条件下存储您的个人信息。

2.2 信息存储的地域
我们会按照法律法规规定，将境内收集的用户个人信息存储于中国境内。
目前我们不会跨境传输或存储您的个人信息。将来如需跨境传输或存储的，我们会向您告知信息出境的目的、接收方、安全保证措施和安全风险，并征得您的同意。

2.3 产品或服务停止运营时的通知
当我们的产品或服务发生停止运营的情况时，我们将以推送通知、公告等形式通知您，并在合理期限内删除您的个人信息或进行匿名化处理，法律法规另有规定的除外。

3. 信息安全
我们使用各种安全技术和程序，以防信息的丢失、不当使用、未经授权阅览或披露。例如，在某些服务中，我们将利用加密技术（例如SSL）来保护您提供的个人信息。但请您理解，由于技术的限制以及可能存在的各种恶意手段，在互联网行业，即便竭尽所能加强安全措施，也不可能始终保证信息百分之百的安全。您需要了解，您接入我们的服务所用的系统和通讯网络，有可能因我们可控范围外的因素而出现问题。

4. 我们如何使用信息
我们可能将在向您提供服务的过程之中所收集的信息用作下列用途：

向您提供服务；
在我们提供服务时，用于身份验证、客户服务、安全防范、诈骗监测、存档和备份用途，确保我们向您提供的产品和服务的安全性；
帮助我们设计新服务，改善我们现有服务；
使我们更加了解您如何接入和使用我们的服务，从而针对性地回应您的个性化需求，例如语言设定、位置设定、个性化的帮助服务和指示，或对您和其他用户作出其他方面的回应；
向您提供与您更加相关的广告以替代普遍投放的广告；
评估我们服务中的广告和其他促销及推广活动的效果，并加以改善；
软件认证或管理软件升级；
让您参与有关我们产品和服务的调查。

5. 信息共享
目前，我们不会主动共享或转让您的个人信息至第三方，如存在其他共享或转让您的个人信息或您需要我们将您的个人信息共享或转让至第三方情形时，我们会直接或确认第三方征得您对上述行为的明示同意。

为了投放广告，评估、优化广告投放效果等目的，我们需要向广告主及其代理商等第三方合作伙伴共享您的部分数据，要求其严格遵守我们关于数据隐私保护的措施与要求，包括但不限于根据数据保护协议、承诺书及相关数据处理政策进行处理，避免识别出个人身份，保障隐私安全。
我们不会向合作伙伴分享可用于识别您个人身份的信息（例如您的姓名或电子邮件地址），除非您明确授权。
我们不会对外公开披露所收集的个人信息，如必须公开披露时，我们会向您告知此次公开披露的目的、披露信息的类型及可能涉及的敏感信息，并征得您的明示同意。
随着我们业务的持续发展，我们有可能进行合并、收购、资产转让等交易，我们将告知您相关情形，按照法律法规及不低于本《隐私政策》所要求的标准继续保护或要求新的控制者继续保护您的个人信息。

另外，根据相关法律法规及国家标准，以下情形中，我们可能会共享、转让、公开披露个人信息无需事先征得您的授权同意：

与国家安全、国防安全直接相关的；
与公共安全、公共卫生、重大公共利益直接相关的；
犯罪侦查、起诉、审判和判决执行等直接相关的；
出于维护个人信息主体或其他个人的生命、财产等重大合法权益但又很难得到本人同意的；
个人信息主体自行向社会公众公开个人信息的；
从合法公开披露的信息中收集个人信息的，如合法的新闻报道、政府信息公开等渠道。

6. 您的权利
在您使用我们的服务期间，我们可能会视产品具体情况为您提供相应的操作设置，以便您可以查询、删除、更正或撤回您的相关个人信息，您可参考相应的具体指引进行操作。此外，我们还设置了投诉举报渠道，您的意见将会得到及时的处理。如果您无法通过上述途径和方式行使您的个人信息主体权利，您可以通过本《隐私政策》中提供的联系方式提出您的请求，我们会按照法律法规的规定予以反馈。
当您决定不再使用我们的产品或服务时，可以申请注销账户。注销账户后，除法律法规另有规定外，我们将删除或匿名化处理您的个人信息。

7. 变更
我们可能适时修订本《隐私政策》的条款。当变更发生时，我们会在版本更新时向您提示新的《隐私政策》，并向您说明生效日期。请您仔细阅读变更后的《隐私政策》内容，若您继续使用我们的服务，即表示您同意我们按照更新后的《隐私政策》处理您的个人信息。

8. 未成年人保护
我们鼓励父母或监护人指导未满十八岁的未成年人使用我们的服务。我们建议未成年人鼓励他们的父母或监护人阅读本《隐私政策》，并建议未成年人在提交的个人信息之前寻求父母或监护人的同意和指导。

OjhdtApps（以下简称“我们”）依据本协议为用户（以下简称“你”）提供Parabox服务。本协议对你和我们均具有法律约束力。一旦使用该软件及相关服务，则表明你充分知悉并接受协议所规定的一切内容（包括但不限于《隐私政策》的约束）。如果你不接受这些条款，你也可选择停止使用。

一、本服务的功能
本服务为用户提供消息收发，会话编组，文件管理，云端备份，通知进化，插件化信息源接入，数据导出功能。

二、基于网络的服务
使用某些功能表示你同意我们传输某些标准计算机信息。软件基于这些信息提供服务。某些情况下，连接建立时，你不会另外收到通知。你可以关闭这个功能或不使用这项服务（于设备权限管理中禁用相关权限）。

三、应用权限说明
为实现应用基本功能及提供基本服务，本服务需要调用你的如下权限或功能：

联网权限：获取用户头像，文件传输等
存储权限：读取设备图片，文件；保存图片，文件到本地等
调取相机权限：通过拍照获取头像，发送图片等
调取设备麦克风权限：录制语音，语音搜索等
通知权限：发送消息通知

四、关于扩展
“扩展”是Parabox提供开源社区的应用开放接口，开发者可利用扩展功能扩充Parabox功能，扩展预期行为仅受扩展本身控制。一旦使用扩展，则表明你已充分知悉并承担使用扩展可能导致的后果。由于使用扩展导致的隐私泄露，数据泄露，财产损失及其他法律责任与软件开发者无关。

五、责任范围及限制
你使用本服务得到的结果仅供参考，实际情况以官方为准。

六、隐私保护
我们重视对你隐私的保护，你的个人隐私信息将根据《隐私政策》受到保护与规范，详情请参阅《隐私政策》。

七、其他条款
7.1 本协议所有条款的标题仅为阅读方便，本身并无实际涵义，不能作为本协议涵义解释的依据。
7.2 本协议条款无论因何种原因部分无效或不可执行，其余条款仍有效，对双方具有约束力。
Extension has been disabled, please select the correct working mode.
Extension Connect service is about to be discontinued
Extension Connect service is about to be launched
After connecting to the cloud service, Parabox can automatically back up the chat files of the specified session to the cloud storage for you to download and access again at any time.
The automatic backup function needs to be turned on manually. Please go to setting detailed configuration later.
It has been detected that the extension is not installed or configured correctly, and Parabox will not work properly. Whether to continue?
Parabox needs to work with the extension. The extension will take on the function of docking with various instant messaging platforms, providing Parabox with message sources and sending channels.
If installed extensions do not appear below, or if there is a delay in getting the status, try resetting the extension connection.
%1$s installed extensions detected, %2$s of which are working correctly.
Go to Google Play for more officially maintained extensions.
Go to Github to search for extensions contributed by the community.

The extension is open to the entire open source community. Parabox does not verify the source and authenticity of the extension, and the expected behavior of the extension cannot be guaranteed. For your data security, please do not install and enable extensions from unknown sources.

The extension must remain running in the background to work properly. If the extension is stopped due to resource reclamation, you may need to manually restart the extension. Running as a foreground service, enabling background locks, and turning off battery optimization can help extend background retention.
Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) is a system-level messaging service launched by Google.

This feature allows to receive messages from other devices and echo back messages to be sent in the same way. This will prevent the communication service from residing in the background of the local machine, and greatly reduce the performance overhead of the local machine.
Usually requires you to have two or more devices running Parabox with a stable connection to Google services.
Unable to connect to FCM network.
Run Parabox in extended mode on your alternate device, run the \"Configure FCM Forwarding\" bootstrap, and check the FCM network connection status.
Copy the Token of this device and input it into the corresponding input box of the standby device.
Copy the token from your backup device and paste it into the input box below.
Configure the media file transfer method
Since FCM does not allow transfer of media files, you need to additionally configure the transfer method available to all devices for such files.

A \"ParaboxTemp\" directory will be created under the root directory of the storage bucket to store media files (pictures, audio, etc.) to be sent. Files will not be deleted automatically after transfer, please clean up as needed.
Now that you have completed all the configuration of the FCM sink, please continue with the rest of the bootstrapping.
For additional tips on using FCM, browse the user documentation.
Abbreviation of the region where the bucket is located, such as ap-guangzhou
Bucket name, consisting of bucketname-appid, such as examplebucket-1250000000
Successfully connected to Google Drive, ready to proceed.
Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) is a system-level messaging service launched by Google.

This function allows you to use this device as a relay to forward received messages to the target device through FCM, and receive message sending requests from the target device in the same way. This will drastically reduce the performance overhead on the target device.
Usually requires you to have two or more devices running Parabox with a stable connection to Google services.
Run the \"Configure FCM Loopback\" guide on your other device and check the FCM network connection status.
Copy the token from your other device and paste it into the input box below.
Copy the Token of this device, and input it into the corresponding input boxes of other devices in sequence.
Configure the media file transfer method
Since FCM does not allow transfer of media files, you need to additionally configure the transfer method available to all devices for such files.
You have completed all configurations on the forwarding side of FCM, please continue to complete other bootstrapping.
For additional tips on using FCM, browse the user documentation.
You have completed all necessary setup items. Click the \"Finish\" button to enter the Home page.
The mode used by default. Will attempt to host an extension connection service to establish communication with extensions installed on this machine.

Will try to form an FCM network between multiple devices to communicate. Extended functions will be disabled in this mode.\nThis usually requires having two or more machines running Parabox, one of which is already running in extended mode with FCM forwarder mode turned on.

In this mode, messaging will be completely taken over by FCM and handled by a private server. Extended functions will be disabled in this mode. \nThis usually requires a private server and is configured according to the tutorial instructions.
Please select the appropriate working mode according to the specific usage scenario.
Set avatar and nickname to provide better in-app display.
Skipping the boot may miss necessary configuration items, causing the software to not run properly. If you are using this software for the first time, please proceed with caution.

When working as a forwarder, this function will take messages from installed extensions and forward them to the intended receiving device. \nWhen working as a receiving end, this function will return the message to be sent to the target forwarding end, which will be processed and sent. \nWorks in forwarding mode by default. To switch to receive mode, go to work mode settings to change.
Requires Google Drive connection. Go to the \"Connect to Cloud Services\" settings.
The selected chat resources (pictures, voice) will be permanently deleted and cannot be restored. Are you sure?
All pictures, voices will be deleted\nEstimated to free up %1$s space
Pictures received in %1$s days or earlier, audio will be deleted\nEstimated to free up %2$s space
Local caching of copies of pictures and voices can effectively avoid invalidation and repeated downloads of pictures and voices, but it will significantly increase the space occupied.
Media files will be cached and are expected to take up more space.

This feature hands over messaging operations completely to FCM. The message source running on the private server pushes the message to the local machine through the FCM downstream message, and the pending sending request sent by the local machine is returned to the FCM upstream message and returned to the private server for processing. This will allow all background services to be turned off while maintaining the normal operation of basic functions, greatly reducing the performance overhead of the machine.
Restricted by the FCM mechanism, all messages must be relayed through the Parabox public message transfer server (api.parabox.ojhdt.dev). This process does not record any of your chat data.
Usually requires a private server, configured according to the tutorial guidelines, and has a stable connection to Google services.
Copy the Token and fill it in the corresponding configuration item of the server configuration file.
Parabox is running in the background
An error occurred while fetching data
Automatically delete chat resources when starting the application
Chat resources received %1$d days or older will be deleted
Ordinary files such as documents, compressed files, and videos will be cached at the same time. Generally do not need to open.
Common files such as documents, compressed files, and videos will be cached at the same time.
No app found to open this file
Cloud service misconfiguration, try regular download
